SELECT T.ARTICLE_COMMENT_KEY ,T.ARTICLE_KEY ,T.FKEY ,T.PKEY ,T.OKEY ,T.GKEY ,T.CONTENT ,T.WRITER ,T.WRITER_PWD ,T.DELETE_FLG ,T.DELETE_TYP ,T.FRST_OPER_ID ,T.FRST_OPER_DT ,T.FRST_OPER_IP ,T.LAST_OPER_ID ,T.LAST_OPER_DT ,T.LAST_OPER_IP FROM TB_ARTICLE_COMMENT T
ORDER BY T.FKEY ASC, T.OKEY ASC LIMIT #{firstRecordIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT T.ARTICLE_COMMENT_KEY ,T.ARTICLE_KEY ,T.FKEY ,T.PKEY ,T.OKEY ,T.GKEY ,T.CONTENT ,T.WRITER ,T.WRITER_PWD ,T.DELETE_FLG ,T.DELETE_TYP ,T.FRST_OPER_ID ,T.FRST_OPER_DT ,T.FRST_OPER_IP ,T.LAST_OPER_ID ,T.LAST_OPER_DT ,T.LAST_OPER_IP FROM TB_ARTICLE_COMMENT T
ORDER BY T.FKEY ASC, T.OKEY ASC

SELECT T.ARTICLE_COMMENT_KEY articleCommentKey ,T.ARTICLE_KEY articleKey ,T.FKEY fkey ,T.PKEY pkey ,T.OKEY okey ,T.GKEY gkey ,T.CONTENT content ,T.WRITER writer ,T.WRITER_PWD writerPwd ,T.DELETE_FLG deleteFlg ,T.DELETE_TYP deleteTyp ,T.FRST_OPER_ID frstOperId ,T.FRST_OPER_DT frstOperDt ,T.FRST_OPER_IP frstOperIp ,T.LAST_OPER_ID lastOperId ,T.LAST_OPER_DT lastOperDt ,T.LAST_OPER_IP lastOperIp FROM TB_ARTICLE_COMMENT T WHERE T.ARTICLE_COMMENT_KEY = #{articleCommentKey}
SELECT * FROM TB_ARTICLE_COMMENT WHERE PKEY = #{articleCommentKey} ORDER BY OKEY
